item.title: I need an admin invincibility command
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

Client.java

search after public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

then under that add this

public boolean playerInvincible = false;

then search for

public boolean process() {

and under that add this

if (playerInvincible){ if(IsDead) IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }

now search after

if (command.startsWith

now after the last } of the command add this

else if (command.startsWith("invincible") && playerRights >= 2){ playerInvincible = true; } else if (command.startsWith("invincibleoff") && playerRights >= 2){ playerInvincible = false; }

and there it is type ::invincible to get infinite hp(can never die no matter what)

and ::invincibleoff to die like a man(aka no infinite hp)

you can always change the commandsâ€¦ this is just something i made fast and that should work
